name: algebra
description: means completeness and balancing, from the Arabic word الجبر

scripts.build: npm test && npm run browserify && npm run minify && npm run docs; git status
scripts.docs:_data: for x in package.json tags.json; do npm run docs:_data:$x; done
scripts.homepage:
echo "---
title: $npm_package_name
---" > docs/index.md; cat README.md >> docs/index.md
scripts.docs: npm run homepage; npm run docs:_data
scripts.lint: npm run lint_src; npm run lint_test
scripts.minify: cd dist; terser ${npm_package_name}.js --source-map --output ${npm_package_name}.min.js --compress --mangle -b beautify=false,preamble='"// http://g14n.info/algebra"'; cd -
scripts.postversion: git push origin v${npm_package_version}; npm publish
scripts.postpublish: npm run docs:_data; git commit -am ':arrow_up: updated version'; git push origin master
